bed.description: Against one wall, you spot a well-made bed with neatly arranged sheets and plump pillows. The bedframe is sturdy, and a cozy-looking quilt is neatly folded at the foot of the mattress. It seems like a comfortable place for rest and respite.

vase.description: A regal vase, its porcelain surface painted with scenes of nature

desk.description: You see a small notebook, a picture of a cup of tea with biscuits, and a few pencils scattered about
